page.title: 08My House
page.content: In my kitchen there is a microwave oven,a cooker, a dishwasher, a sink to wash up the pans, a fridge, a freezer, a breakfast table and a washing machine. We have cupboards and drawers for food, crockery and cutlery. In my living room there is a settee and two chairs. There is a television and video, music centre and a coffee table. There are three bedrooms in my house. In my bedroom there are two beds, one for me and the other for my sister. There is a wardrobe and dressing table. The room is full of soft toys. In the bathroom there is a bath and shower, toilet, wash basin and cupboard for medicines and toothbrushes. We have a garden with lawns and flower beds.
